#About Me

Hi Everyone! I am Sarah (Yian) Jiang. I am currently studying in Masters in Financial Analysis program at London Business School. I acquired a bachelor degree from Tsinghua University in accounting. I am currently pursuing a job in product management.

To let you know more about me, I have attached my resume below. You can also reach out to me thorough the contacts shown in the homepage.
